column4: how do i customize the color of files that show up in the terminal, this bright green stuff is hard to read?
'man ls', there's some LS_COLORS variable you have to change

I vaguely remember looking into that like a year or two go, I think there were some real gotchas in getting that variable to work, but I don't remember now...  Maybe it's straight forward... Can't remember.  'man ls' and search for LS_COLORS
copy a blank space text into the clipboard
